channel.title: supernova 2016 on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in supernova 2016 on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Heartbeat 2
item.description: Am I know you told So many times Am So many words In different rhymes Dm C G But I don’t feel the same Am I wasn’t innocent, I know Am And things I did for sure were wrong Dm C G The time has passed so long Am Feeling your heartbeat C That's what I want G That's what I need Am Feeling again that you're breathing with me Am I’m getting wild when I’m alone Am I learned by heart you're not my own D C Am But I never asked you to be long Am Your my desire and my pain Am But all the battles are in vain D C G You mean more than anything to me Am Feeling your heartbeat C That's what I want G That's what I need Am Feeling again that you're breathing with me Am Feeling your heartbeat C That's what I want G That's what I need Am Feeling again that you're breathing with me F You’re the one I need Am You’re the air that I breathe C Don’t throw my heart away G I want you to stay Am Feeling your heartbeat C That's what I want G That's what I need Am Feeling again that you're breathing with me Am Feeling your heartbeat C That's what I want G That's what I need Am Feeling again that you're breathing with me Am Feeling your heartbeat

item.title: Being A Friend
item.description: Pieces falling That hold us together Chances we take That turn us for better It’s a road that never end And leads to something we call a friend And no matter how far I will know where you are I will never stop being your friend And I never will ‘Cause you’re my friend when I’m down and blue ‘Cause you’re my friend, I can count on you Your heart has turned around and I’m blessed that I know You are my friend, are my friend, I can count on you, ooh… Show them the best of you I’ll make you dare Believe me, when it’s time to go You know I will care And when the time comes for us to part Oh, I really want you to know That no matter how far I will know where you are I will never stop being your friend And I never will, oh… ‘Cause you’re my friend when I’m down and blue ‘Cause you’re my friend, I can count on you Your heart has turned around and I’m blessed that I know You are my friend, are my friend ‘Cause you’re my friend when I’m down and blue ‘Cause you’re my friend, I can count on you Your heart has turned around and I’m blessed that I know You are my friend, are my friend, you are my friend I can count on you

item.title: Look In The Mirror
item.description: All of us have the same goal To drive the road that makes us call man pleased There’s an illusion we believe in That our happiness can be taken away Open up to what is now Take a clear look at what’s going on Is there a reason to smile Or is it time to change for the better? If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror I know I don’t have to wait long Till I’ll be free from this need To have something that gives me relief I’m learning to love life as it is Waiting for the perfect lover Who will come and make my grief go away But I know it’s too much to ask I’ll just deal with my demons alone If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror I know I don’t have to wait long Till I’ll be free from this need To have something that gives me relief I’m learning to love I know I don’t have to wait long Till I’ll be free from this need To have something that gives me relief I’m learning to love life as it is Ooh yeah yeah… Till I’ll be free from this need I’m learning to love, I’m learning to love I know I don’t have to wait long I’m learning to love (Life as it is)

item.title: Choices
item.description: Endless possibilities Different you, different me Lovers make and lovers break Funny how the smallest thing can alter everything Endless possibilities Different you, different me One step here and one step there You are closer now and further than you’ve ever been Every single choice you make Every single step you take The ink you leave’s indelible Choices, choices Every little word you say Every promise that you break The ink you leave’s indelible Choices, choices There’s always, there’s always There’s always and always and always a choice There’s always, there’s always There’s always and always and always a choice Endless possibilities Different you, different me You can stay or walk away But you’ll never know for sure how it all would have been Every single choice you make Every single step you take The ink you leave’s indelible Choices, choices There’s always (Choices) There’s always a choice There’s always, there’s always There’s always and always a choice There’s always, there’s always There’s always and always and always a choice There’s always, there’s always There’s always and always and always a choice

item.title: Damnation
item.description: [Am] Look through my [F] mind It’s a [C] world of con[E]fusion [Am] There's nothing [F] right to see There’s [C] nothing true to [E] feel [Am] Run, I am [F] cursed Your [C] spell won’t [E] save me My [Am] world is dark and [F] bleak My [C] heart is still and [E] cold [Am] Speak to my [F] soul It’s a [C] voice of the non-[E] existent There’s [Am] nothing to [F] understand There’s [C] nothing fair for [E] you [Am] I am too far, too [F] deep You will [C] never reach my [E] soul [Am] Stay away from [F] me You [C] cannot make it [E] real [Am] I’m too close to [F] fall From the [C] heaven of your [E] dream [Am] Say goodbye to me [F] dear I’m [C] leaving you be[E]hind [Am] Look through your [F] mind It’s a [C] world of destruc[E]tion [Am] There’s nothing to [F] memorize There’s [C] nothing bright for [E] me [Am] Speak to your [F] soul It’s a [C] voice of fading [E] prayer [Am] There’s nothing [F] to revive There’s [C] nothing I can [E] change [Am] I am too far, too [F] deep You will [C] never reach my [E] soul [Am] Stay away from [F] me You [C] cannot make it [E] real [Am] I’m too close to [F] fall From the [C] heaven of your [E] dream [Am] Say goodbye to me [F] dear I’m [C] leaving you be[E]hind

item.title: Heartbeat
item.description: [Am] I know you told So many times [Am] So many words In different rhymes But [D] i don’t [F] feel the [G] same [Am] I wasn’t innocent, i know [Am] And things i did for sure were wrong The [D] time has [F] passed so [G] long Feeling your [Am] heartbeat Thats what i [C] want Thats what i [G] need Feeling again that youre breathing with [Am] me [Am] I’m getting wild when i’m alone [Am] I learned by heart youre not my own But [D] i never [F] asked you to be[G]long [Am] Your my desire and my pain [Am] But all the battles are in vain You [D] mean more [F] than anything to [G] me Feeling your [Am] heartbeat Thats what i [C] want Thats what i [G] need Feeling again that youre breathing with [Am] me Feeling your [Am] heartbeat Thats what i [C] want Thats what i [G] need Feeling again that youre breathing with [Am] me [D] You’re the one i need You’re the [F] air that i breath [D] Don’t throw my heart away I want you to [E] stay Feeling your [Am] heartbeat Thats what i [C] want Thats what i [G] need Feeling again that youre breathing with [Am] me Feeling your [Am] heartbeat Thats what i [C] want Thats what i [G] need Feeling again that youre breathing with [Am] me Feeling your [Am] heartbeat

item.title: I Can
item.description: One more day, one more night Hard to say what’s on my mind I tried, I tried Every thought on my mind Makes me feel that love is blind This time, this time I will follow, follow you I will follow, follow you I can, I can almost feel the sea I can do anything to see you again Yes I can, I can write your memories ‘Cause that is all we need to stay alive And I really wanna see you again Then the storms that we survive They let me back to life I tried, you know that I tried Now that you are next to me I can feel infinity again I feel alive I will follow, follow you I will follow, follow you I can, I can almost feel the sea I can do anything to see you again Yes I can, I can write your memories ‘Cause that is all we need to stay alive And I really wanna see you again I can, yes I can I can, I can see you again I can, yes I can I can I will follow, follow you I will follow, follow you I can, I can almost feel the sea I can do anything to see you again Yes I can, I can write your memories ‘Cause that is all we need to stay alive And I really wanna see you again I can almost feel the sea I can do anything to see you again Yes I can, I can write your memories ‘Cause that is all we need to stay alive And I really wanna see you again.
